Package com.web_course.chat_app.api.message

Interface MessageRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Message,​Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Message,​Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Message,​Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Message>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Message,​Long>
@Repository public interface MessageRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Message,​Long>
The interface Message repository.
This is the repository layer for our message database.

    • findAllMessagesWithSubString

      @Query("SELECT m FROM Message m WHERE m.message like %?1%") List<Message> findAllMessagesWithSubString​(String subString)
      Finds all messages with sub string.
      Parameters:
      subString - the sub string to search.
      Returns:
      list of messages containing this sub-string

    • findMessagesFromUser

      @Query("SELECT m FROM Message m WHERE m.username = ?1") List<Message> findMessagesFromUser​(String username)
      Finds messages from a given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search.
      Returns:
      list of messages sent from this user.

    • findLastI

      @Query("SELECT m FROM Message m ORDER BY m.mid DESC") List<Message> findLastI​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
       Use this to find the last i messages from the DB.

  Usage:
      PageRequest.ofSize(i). PageRequest.ofSize(5)
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pageable of size i.
      Returns:
      the last i messages.
